name: Life Time Chequamegon MTB Festival

distances.name: Chequamegon 40
distances.description: Point-to-point from Hayward to Cable via Birkie Ski Trail, forest roads, and snowmobile routes

distances.name: Short & Fat
distances.description: Shorter loop near Cable with similar mixed terrain

terrain: Mixed Northwoods terrain including Birkie Ski Trail, forest roads, gravel roads, and snowmobile tracks with punchy climbs
weather: Fall conditions in northern Wisconsin - cool temperatures, possibility of rain
uniqueCharacteristics: Historic 40-mile point-to-point course from Hayward to Cable
Known as the 'Northwoods drag race' with fast mixed terrain
Signature Fire Tower climb at mile 29 is key selection point
Part of Life Time Grand Prix off-road series
Festival atmosphere with multiple events and community celebration
Uses famous American Birkebeiner ski trail system
popularity: High - Life Time Grand Prix event
